casebody.data:
STATE
v.
J.C. 405P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 27, 2017 Lauren Tally Earnhardt, Assistant Attorney General, William P. Hart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for J.C. State of N. C. Judicial Dept., for N.C. Judicial Department.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of November 2017."
